H0.text: what kind of book is where 's waldo. Activity Book

H1.text: what kind of book is where 's waldo. Picture Book

H2.text: what kind of book is where 's waldo. Game Book

H3.text: what kind of book is where 's waldo. puzzle

A4.text: Where's Wally? is a series of children's puzzle books

A5.text: The books consist of a series of detailed double-page spread illustrations each depicting hundreds of people doing a variety of amusing things at a location

A6.text: Puzzle books may contain puzzles all of simply one type like (e.g. crosswords, sudoku, or wordsearch) or a mixture of different puzzle types.

A7.text: A puzzle book is a type of activity book which contains a collection of puzzles for the reader to complete.

A8.text: The first crossword puzzle book was published in 1924 by the editors of the newspaper New York World.
